Text: "Time Pussy" is an early science fiction short story by American writer Isaac Asimov.
Triplets:<Isaac Asimov
1:
--------------------
Text: Time Pussy:  It was the third of three stories Asimov wrote for John W. Campbell for a new category of science fiction tall tales in "Astounding Science Fiction" called "Probability Zero".
Triplets:<Time Pussy
3:
--------------------
Text: Time Pussy:  Campbell also wanted to run the story under a pseudonym, since he wanted to encourage new writers to write "Probability Zero" stories.
Triplets:<Time Pussy
